dt.t: The speech will {wi}highlight{/wi} the need for education reform.

dt: {bc}to constitute a significant or especially interesting part of {bc}to constitute a highlight of

dt.t: His trip to Europe was {wi}highlighted{/wi} by a visit to Vatican City.

dt: {bc}to cause (something, such as text or an icon) to be displayed in a way that stands out on an electronic screen (as of a computer or smartphone)

shortdef: to throw a strong light on
to center attention on : emphasize, stress
to constitute a significant or especially interesting part of : to constitute a highlight of
